website_summaries.verdict: Multiple pockets and full-length dividers allow you to store and organize your clubs and other gear easily.
pros: Sharp-looking golf bag that’s available in six different color patterns
Includes a kickstand leg, so you can lean the bag at a 45º angle for convenience
Extra handle on top is convenient to use
cons: It’ll be pretty heavy once you add your gear, so it’s not great for walkers

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a bad rating because there was supposed to be a hood cover in one of the pockets that snaps on to the bag, and it was not there. After calling Calloway support, my only option is to buy a new bag, return this one, and hope the new one has the hood included as it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and functional, strong good-lookng and light. Lots of room for a carry bag, very spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Tate

customer_reviews.title: Ok low cost bag
customer_reviews.text: Problem I have with it is the compartments are not separated so after you clubs bounce around on the cart they get jumbled and are hard to retrieve or difficult to get all the way in the bag. I would not buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Al T.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, not as many pockets as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: A great bag by Callaway. I like the lighter weight of this bag, and how easily it can go from base stand, to legs out with no effort. There is a Velcro strip for placing your glove on, which is ok. I do wish there were a few more pockets or at least additional D-rings to hang things from.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag except for the dividers
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Only fault of it is the dividers. After only a few months of use, the dividers are catching the clubs due to being ripped. Next bag, I will get a 14 way divided bag.
customer_reviews.author: JLNewton

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, over a year of weekly use
customer_reviews.text: Been using this bag for over a year with weekly use, very lightweight and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I was look for a new bag and it has nice amount of pockets and well made
customer_reviews.author: Mario Chang

customer_reviews.title: Good quality 👍
customer_reviews.text: Liked the look,lightweight,plenty of zippered pockets for equipment.also liked bag stand.
customer_reviews.author: john perez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for this bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent golf bag - it looks like a tour bag but plays like a lightweight walking bag
customer_reviews.author: Phillip D

customer_reviews.title: Super light, great bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the scratch golfer that needs a bag update.
customer_reviews.author: Allison B.

product_meta.title: Callaway Golf 2019 Chev Stand Bag
feature_bullets: Functionality and Bold Design with 5-Way Top with Full Length Dividers
Glove Attachment, Built in Tee Holder and Easy Grab Handle
Velour Lined Valuables Pocket and Full Length Apparel Pocket
